backend/main.mo: Motoko canister handling blob storage, access control, user profiles, and custom order submission with admin-only order retrieval.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping bouquet collection features to affected files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of each frontend file in the project.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS configuration defining color variables, themes, and base styling for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point setting metadata, icons, fonts, and root mount point for the React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React router setup defining routes for all collection and utility pages using TanStack Router.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteFoote: Footer component with brand info, Instagram/email links, attribution, and dynamic caffeine.ai tracking URL.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteLayou: Layout wrapper rendering TopNav, page content, and SiteFooter around all routes.
frontend/src/components/layout/TopNav.ts: Responsive top navigation bar with logo, desktop links, and a toggleable mobile menu.
frontend/src/components/Section.tsx: Reusable Section and SectionHeader components providing layout spacing, animations, and consistent typography.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on Internet Identity, invalidating queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, managing login, logout, and identity loading.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for submitting and fetching custom orders using the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with light/dark theme variables and custom animations.
frontend/src/lib/catalogImageMap.ts: Maps product categories to their corresponding image asset paths and provides helper access functions.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Utility function for merging Tailwind class names with clsx and twMerge.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point initializing React, query client, and Internet Identity provider.
frontend/src/pages/BookmarkCollectionPag: Renders the bookmark collection page with product image, pricing card, and feature grid.
frontend/src/pages/BouquetCollectionPage: Displays a grid of bouquet products with images, descriptions, and tiered or starting prices.
frontend/src/pages/CustomizedCardCollect: Shows customized card offerings with pricing, sample image, and occasion categories.
frontend/src/pages/CustomOrdersPage.tsx: Provides a custom order form with file uploads and submits the data via a mutation hook.
frontend/src/pages/FramesMemoryKeepsakes: Renders a product grid for polaroid prints, books, and albums with descriptions and pricing options.
frontend/src/pages/HandcraftedCuteEssent: Displays a grid of cute handcrafted accessory images with a brief descriptive note.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Home landing page featuring category navigation, hero branding, and value propositions.
frontend/src/pages/PolaroidCollectionPag: React page displaying polaroid print sizes and polaroid bouquet products using cards, sections, and mapped data arrays.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, persisting, and clearing URL or session-stored parameters with hash-routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending theme colors, fonts, animations, and plugins for the projectâ€™s UI styling.
project_state.json: Project state file detailing bouquet gallery requirements, design guidelines, image assets, and implemented features.
